feature.name: Abalos Colles
feature.origin: Named for classical albedo feature at 72N, 70W.

feature.name: Abus Vallis
feature.origin: Classical name for Humber River in England.

feature.name: Acheron Catena
feature.origin: Named for classical albedo feature at 35N, 140W.

feature.name: Adamas Labyrinthus
feature.origin: Classical albedo feature name; "A River of Diamonds"; today's River Sarbarnarekha in India.

feature.name: Aeolis
feature.origin: Floating island where winds were kept in a cave.

feature.name: Aeria
feature.origin: Greek name for Egypt; "far land of mist".

feature.name: Aethiopis
feature.origin: Countries of the Ethiopians on southern edge of the Earth.

feature.name: Airy-0
feature.origin: Small crater within crater Airy that defines zero degrees longitude on Mars.

feature.name: Al-Qahira Vallis
feature.origin: Word for 'Mars' in Arabic, Indonesian, Malay.

feature.name: Amazonis
feature.origin: Land of the Amazons; on the island Hesperia.

feature.name: Amazonis Planitia
feature.origin: Classical albedo feature name; home of the Amazons.

feature.name: Amazonis Sulci
feature.origin: Albedo feature name; home of the Amazons.

feature.name: Amenthes
feature.origin: Egyptian name for place where souls of the dead go.

feature.name: Amphitrites Patera
feature.origin: Mare Amphitrites; classical albedo feature name.

feature.name: [Angusta Patera]
feature.origin: Classical albedo name. Name dropped Sept. 2006 because feature was incorrectly named.

feature.name: Anio Valles
feature.origin: Classical river in Italy; modern Aniene and Teverone rivers.

feature.name: [Anseris Cavus]
feature.origin: Named for albedo feature Anseris Fons. Same feature as Peraea Cavus.

feature.name: Apollo Patera
feature.origin: Greek god of light, poetry, music and arts, one of the Olympian gods, son of Zeus.

feature.name: Apsus Vallis
feature.origin: Classical river in ancient Macedonia, present-day Greece.

feature.name: Arcadia Dorsa
feature.origin: Named for classical albedo feature at 45N, 120W.

feature.name: [Arena Rupes]
feature.origin: Name changed in 1982 to Arnus Vallis.

feature.name: Argyre
feature.origin: "Silver" Island at mouth of Ganges River; present-day Arakan, Burma.

feature.name: Arimanes Rupes
feature.origin: Albedo feature; classical Persian deity of wickedness.

feature.name: Arnon
feature.origin: Classical name for present El-Mojib River, Jordan.

feature.name: Arnus Vallis
feature.origin: Classical and present day Arno River in Tuscany, Italy (previously named Arena Rupes).

feature.name: Arsinoes Chaos
feature.origin: Daughter of Ptolomy Lagun and Bernice.

feature.name: Artynia Catena
feature.origin: Named for classical albedo feature at 54N, 137W.

feature.name: Asopus Vallis
feature.origin: Classical name for modern Hagios River, Greece.

feature.name: Athabasca Valles
feature.origin: River in Canada. (Changed from Athabasca Vallis.)

feature.name: Athena Patera
feature.origin: Greek goddess of wisdom, one of the Olympians, daughter of Zeus.

feature.name: Aurorae Sinus
feature.origin: "Bay of Rosy Dawn"; Aurora held back the dawn.

feature.name: Ausonia
feature.origin: Country of the Aruncii (Ausones in Greek).

feature.name: [Australis Patera]
feature.origin: Classical albedo name. Name dropped Sept. 2006 because feature was incorrectly named.

feature.name: [Australis Tholus]
feature.origin: Classical albedo feature name; dropped in 1978.

feature.name: Avire
feature.origin: Town in the Republic of Vanuatu.

feature.name: Axius Valles
feature.origin: Ancient European River (Vardar River of Greece).

feature.name: Babakin
feature.origin: Soviet builder of unmanned space stations (1914-1970).

feature.name: Baetis Chasma
feature.origin: From classical albedo feature at 5S, 60W; changed from Iamunae Chasma.

feature.name: Balboa
feature.origin: Town in the Republic of Panama, formerly within the US Panama Canal Zone.

feature.name: Baltia
feature.origin: Name of large island in northern Europe where amber was found.

feature.name: Bam
feature.origin: Town in Kermn province in Iran.

feature.name: Banh
feature.origin: Town in Burkina Faso (formerly Upper Volta).

feature.name: Barsukov
feature.origin: Valery L.; Soviet geochemist and planetologist (1928-1992).

feature.name: Bashkaus Valles
feature.origin: River in the Altai Republic, Russia.

feature.name: [Bathys Planum]
feature.origin: Classical albedo feature; name changed to Icaria Planum.

feature.name: Batson
feature.origin: Raymond Milner; American geologist and photogrammetrist (1931-2013).

feature.name: Bombala
feature.origin: Town in New S. Wales, Australia.

feature.name: Boreosyrtis
feature.origin: Northern continuation of Nilosyrtis; "Syrtis of the north."

feature.name: Bunge
feature.origin: Andrey Aleksandrovich; Russian zoologist, permafrost investigator (Late 19th century), and Nicolai A.; Russian chemist.

feature.name: Buvinda Vallis
feature.origin: Classical river in Hibernia; present Boyne River, Ireland.

feature.name: Calydon Fossa
feature.origin: The son of Ares and Astynome.

feature.name: Campbell
feature.origin: John W.; Canadian physicist (1889-1955). William W.; American astronomer (1862-1938).

feature.name: Caralis Chaos
feature.origin: After Caralis Fons, classical albedo feature named after Caralis Lacus, now Beysehir Gl, in Isauria (Asia Minor).

feature.name: Casius
feature.origin: Epithet of Zeus; for his two sanctuaries in Egypt/Arabia and Syria.

feature.name: [Cavi Frigors]
feature.origin: From classical albedo feature Polus Frigoris, at 84S, 30W. Name dropped Sept. 2006, and area covered by this feature included with Cavi Angusti.

feature.name: Cayon
feature.origin: Town in Saint Kitts and Nevis.

feature.name: Cebrenia
feature.origin: Main country of the Trojan Plain.

feature.name: Cecropia
feature.origin: Old name for Acropolis; used to mean Athens.

feature.name: Ceraunius
feature.origin: "Thunderclap"; named for Ceraunii Mountains on coast of Epirus, Greece.

feature.name: Ceraunius Catena
feature.origin: Named for classical albedo feature at 35N 96W.

feature.name: Cerberus
feature.origin: Hound who had 3 heads; guarded gates of hell.

feature.name: Cerberus Fossae
feature.origin: From albedo feature at 10n, 212W. Changed from Cerberus Rupes.

feature.name: [Cerberus Rups]
feature.origin: From albedo feature at 10n, 212W. Changed to Cerberus Fossae.

feature.name: Chalce
feature.origin: Old name of island of Khalki, west of Rhodes.

feature.name: Changsng
feature.origin: Town in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

feature.name: Chinju
feature.origin: Town in the Republic of Korea.

feature.name: Chryse
feature.origin: Island rich in gold; region of Thailand/Malacca.

feature.name: Chrysokeras
feature.origin: "Golden Horn"; Byzantine Peninsula (now Turkey), or its inlet.

feature.name: Clanis Valles
feature.origin: Classical river in Etruria; present Chiana River, Italy.

feature.name: Clota Vallis
feature.origin: Ancient name for present River Clyde, Scotland.

feature.name: Colles Nili
feature.origin: From classical albedo feature Portus Nili, at 38N, 295W.

feature.name: Cooma
feature.origin: Town in New South Wales, Australia.

feature.name: Copais Palus
feature.origin: Named for marsh north of Mt. Helicon in Boeotia, Greece.

feature.name: Coprates
feature.origin: Old name for Persian River Ab-I-Diz.

feature.name: Cross
feature.origin: Charles Arthur; British astronomer and cartographer (1920-1980).

feature.name: Culter
feature.origin: Village near Aberdeen, Scotland, also called Peterculter.

feature.name: Cusus Valles
feature.origin: Classical name for modern Hron River in Czechoslovakia.

feature.name: Cydonia Colles
feature.origin: Named for classical albedo feature at 50N, 355W.

feature.name: Cydonia Labyrinthus
feature.origin: Named for classical albedo feature at 50N, 355W.

feature.name: Danielson
feature.origin: G. Edward Danielson, Jr.; American Engineer (1939-2005).

feature.name: Darwin
feature.origin: Charles R.; British naturalist (1809-1882) and George H.; British astronomer (1845-1912).

feature.name: Davies
feature.origin: Merton Edward; American engineer, planetary geodesist (1917-2001).

feature.name: Dejnev
feature.origin: Semen Ivanovich; Russian geographer, explorer, and navigator (1605-1673).

feature.name: Deltoton Sinus
feature.origin: "Bay of the triangle"; makes triangle with Iapygia and Oenotria.

feature.name: Deucalionis Regio
feature.origin: "Deucalion's region;" Deucalion was King of Thessaly who saved himself from flood.

feature.name: Deuteronilus
feature.origin: Designation of 2nd part of old feature "Nilus."

feature.name: Deva Vallis
feature.origin: Classical name for Dee River in Scotland; new position and coordinates.

feature.name: Dia-Cau
feature.origin: Town in the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.

feature.name: Diacria
feature.origin: Highland area in northern Attica, Greece.

feature.name: Dionysus Patera
feature.origin: Greek god of wine, celebration and ecstasy, patron god of the art and theatre, one of the Olympian gods, son of Zeus.

feature.name: Dioscuria
feature.origin: "Home of Dioscuri," Polydeuces and Pollux; symbolic name for Sparta.

feature.name: Doanus Vallis
feature.origin: Classical river shown in Ptolemy's map; may be modern Mekong River of Burma.

feature.name: Doba
feature.origin: Town in the Republic of Chad.

feature.name: Dogana
feature.origin: Town in the Republic of San Marino.

feature.name: Dokuchaev
feature.origin: Vasily Vasil'evich; Russian soil scientist; founded modern genetical soil science (1840-1903).

feature.name: Domoni
feature.origin: Town in the Union of the Comoros.

feature.name: Drilon Vallis
feature.origin: Classical name for present Drin River, Albania.

feature.name: Dubis Vallis
feature.origin: Classical name for modern Doubs River, France.

feature.name: Durius Valles
feature.origin: Classical name for modern Douro River, Portugal.

feature.name: Echus Chaos
feature.origin: From albedo feature Echus Lacus at 1N, 90W.

feature.name: Echus Palus
feature.origin: Classical albedo feature name, Echus Lacus.

feature.name: Edom
feature.origin: Biblical country of Edomites, south of Judea.

feature.name: Elaver Vallis
feature.origin: Classical name for modern Allier River, France.

feature.name: Electris
feature.origin: Electra's island near River Eridanus; famous for amber formed from tears shed by Phaethon's sisters.

feature.name: Elysium
feature.origin: Home of the blessed on western edge of world.

feature.name: Eos Chaos
feature.origin: Greek name of Aurora; albedo feature.

feature.name: Eridania
feature.origin: Region on the Po River, Italy.

feature.name: Eunostos
feature.origin: "Lucky journey or lucky return"; i.e., infernal regions beyond Elysium.

feature.name: Fancy
feature.origin: Town in Saint Vincent and the Grenadines.

feature.name: Farim
feature.origin: Town in the Republic of Guinea-Bissau.

feature.name: Frento Vallis
feature.origin: Classical name for river in Italy.

feature.name: Gagra
feature.origin: Town in the Republic of Georgia.

feature.name: Galap
feature.origin: Town in the Republic of Palau.

feature.name: [Galaxias Mensae]
feature.origin: Albedo feature name. (Named dropped. Feature is part of Galaxias Colles.)

feature.name: Gali
feature.origin: Town in the Republic of Georgia.

feature.name: Gan
feature.origin: Town in the Republic of the Maldives.

feature.name: Gandzani
feature.origin: Town in the Republic of Georgia.

feature.name: Gehon
feature.origin: Biblical second River of Paradise; bordering Eden.

feature.name: Gori
feature.origin: town in the Republic of Georgia.

feature.name: Granicus Valles
feature.origin: Ancient name for river in Turkey.

feature.name: Gratteri
feature.origin: Town on the island of Sicily, Italy.

feature.name: Gunjur
feature.origin: Town in the Republic of Gambia.

feature.name: Hamelin
feature.origin: Old German town referred to in the Pied Piper fairy tale.

feature.name: Hebes Mensa
feature.origin: Classical albedo feature; name of goddess of youth.

feature.name: Henry
feature.origin: Paul; French astronomer (1848-1905). Prosper; French astronomer (1849-1903).

feature.name: Hephaestus Rups
feature.origin: Named for classical albedo feature at 20N, 240W.

feature.name: Hera Patera
feature.origin: Greek goddess of women and marriage, one of the Olympians, wife of Zeus.

feature.name: Hermes Patera
feature.origin: Greek god of trade, travelers, sports, the messenger of the gods, one of the Olympian gods, son of Zeus.

feature.name: Hermus Vallis
feature.origin: Classical name for river in ancient Lydia (modern Turkey).

feature.name: Herschel
feature.origin: John F.; British astronomer (1792-1871); William H.; British astronomer (1738-1822).

feature.name: Hesperia
feature.origin: "The Occiden"; name for Italy (Greek); or Spain (Roman) or West area of Ethiopians where sun sank.

feature.name: Hiddekel
feature.origin: Tigris River, Babylonia; Biblical third River of Paradise.

feature.name: [Hilo]
feature.origin: Town in Hawaii, USA. Name dropped because crater cannot be located on imagery.

feature.name: Horowitz
feature.origin: Norman H.; American biologist and geneticist (1915-2005).

feature.name: Hypanis Valles
feature.origin: Classical name for river in Scythia; present Kuban River in Russia.

feature.name: Hypsas Vallis
feature.origin: Classical name for river in Sicily.

feature.name: Iamuna Dorsa
feature.origin: From classical albedo feature Iamunae Sinus.

feature.name: Iapygia (Iapigia)
feature.origin: Classically, Iapygia was all of Apulia, or just the Salentine Peninsula.

feature.name: [Iaxartes Tholus]
feature.origin: Classical albedo feature name; name dropped 1979.

feature.name: Iberus Vallis
feature.origin: Classical name for river present Ebro River in NE Spain.

feature.name: Igal
feature.origin: Town in Hungary. Name changed from Igol (incorrect spelling).

feature.name: II Thyle I
feature.origin: Named for Thule; may be middle Norway; used to indicate far northern lands.

feature.name: Indus Vallis
feature.origin: Ancient and modern name for river in Pakistan.

feature.name: Isara Valles
feature.origin: Classical name for modern Oise River in France.

feature.name: Isidis Dorsa
feature.origin: Named for classical albedo feature at 25N, 270W.

feature.name: [Isidis Regio]
feature.origin: Isis' Region; Isis was Egyptian goddess of heaven and fertility.

feature.name: Ismenius Lacus
feature.origin: "Ismenian Lake"; Ismenia is poetic term for Thebes.

feature.name: Johannesburg
feature.origin: Republic of South Africa tracking site.

feature.name: Juventae Fons
feature.origin: The "Fountain of Youth;" a fountain in India.

feature.name: Juventae Mensa
feature.origin: Classical albedo feature name, Juventae Fons

feature.name: Kalba
feature.origin: Town in the United Arab Emirates.

feature.name: Kenge
feature.origin: Town in Democratic Republic of the Congo.

feature.name: Kinkora
feature.origin: Town in Prince Edward Island, Canada.

feature.name: [Kison Tholus]
feature.origin: Classical albedo feature name; name dropped in 1979.

feature.name: Kolonga
feature.origin: Town in the Kingdom of Tonga.

feature.name: Kribi
feature.origin: Town in the United Republic of Cameroon.

feature.name: Krupac
feature.origin: Town in the municipality of Pirot, Serbia.

feature.name: [Labeatis Fossae]
feature.origin: Previously named feature at 30N, 75W; expanded coordinates. Name dropped because in the database twice.

feature.name: Labeatis Fossae
feature.origin: Previously named feature at 30N, 75W; expanded coordinates.

feature.name: Labeatis Mons
feature.origin: Named for albedo feature Labeatis Lacus.

feature.name: Laestrygon (Laestrigon)
feature.origin: Man-eating giants who lived in the west.

feature.name: Laf
feature.origin: Town in the United Republic of Cameroon.

feature.name: Lemuria
feature.origin: Designation of purported drowned continent south of India; also relates to lemur monkeys found on Madagascar and Sunda Islands.

feature.name: Lethe Vallis
feature.origin: River in Katmai National Monument, Alaska, USA.

feature.name: Libya
feature.origin: Area from W. Egypt to greater Syrtis.

feature.name: Licus Vallis
feature.origin: Ancient name for modern Lech River, France.

feature.name: Liris Valles
feature.origin: Ancient name for modern Liri River, Italy.

feature.name: Llanesco
feature.origin: Probably named for Llanes, a town in Spain.

feature.name: Locras Valles
feature.origin: Ancient name for river on Corsica.

feature.name: Lomonosov
feature.origin: Mikhail Vasilievich; Russian poet, scientist, and grammarian (1711-1765).

feature.name: Lpez
feature.origin: Epidio Lpez; Mexican astronomer and author (1879-1965).

feature.name: Lowbury
feature.origin: Named for a town in New Zealand, probably Lowburn incorrectly recorded as Lowbury.

feature.name: Luba
feature.origin: Town in the Republic of Equatorial Guinea.

feature.name: Lucaya
feature.origin: Town in the Commonwealth of the Bahamas.

feature.name: Lunae Palus
feature.origin: Roman Moon goddess Luna; "Luna's Swamp," or African Lunae Mountains where Nile was thought to originate.

feature.name: Majuro
feature.origin: Capital of the Republic of the Marshall Islands.

feature.name: Mare Acidalium
feature.origin: Name for Acidalian (Venusian) fountain in Boeotia where the Graces bathed.

feature.name: Mare Chronium
feature.origin: "Cronian Sea", northern part of World Sea where eternal dead calm, dangerous to ships, prevailed.

feature.name: Mare Cimmerium
feature.origin: Cimmerians were ancient Thracian seafarers; "far western sea" (Homer).

feature.name: Mare Tyrrhenum
feature.origin: Tyrrhenian Sea, between Italy and Sicily.

feature.name: Margaritifer Sinus
feature.origin: "Pearl Bay," after Pearl Coast, South India.

feature.name: Matrona Vallis
feature.origin: Classical name for present Marne River, France.

feature.name: Memnonia
feature.origin: Land of Memnon, King of Ethiopia.

feature.name: Meroe
feature.origin: Ethiopian island on Nile; now Atbar.

feature.name: Milna
feature.origin: Town in the Republic of Croatia.

feature.name: Minio Vallis
feature.origin: Classical name for river in Italy.

feature.name: [Misk]
feature.origin: Town in Turkey. Name dropped because crater cannot be located on imagery.

feature.name: Moeris Lacus
feature.origin: "Moeris Lake;" Moeris was Egyptian lake in Libyan Desert.

feature.name: Mller
feature.origin: Hermann J.; American geneticist (1890-1967), and Carl H.; German astronomer (1851-1925).

feature.name: Munda Vallis
feature.origin: Classical name for river in ancient Lusitania, (modern Mondega River in Portugal).

feature.name: Mutch
feature.origin: Dr. Thomas A.; American geologist, Viking Lander Imaging Team leader (1931-1980).

feature.name: Naju
feature.origin: Town in the Republic of Korea.

feature.name: Naktong Vallis
feature.origin: Modern name for river in the Republic of Korea.

feature.name: Nanedi Valles
feature.origin: Word for "planet" in Sesotho, national language of Lesotho, Africa.

feature.name: Naro Vallis
feature.origin: Ancient name for modern Neretva River, Yugoslavia.

feature.name: Nectar
feature.origin: Named for the drink of the gods.

feature.name: Nereidum Fretum
feature.origin: "Straits of the Nereids", who were sea nymphs.

feature.name: Neretva Vallis
feature.origin: River in Bosnia and Herzegovina and Croatia.

feature.name: Nestus Valles
feature.origin: Classical name for river in Macedonia (Greece).

feature.name: Neves
feature.origin: Town in the Republic of Sao Tome and Principe.

feature.name: Nia Vallis
feature.origin: Lowell canal name; also classical river name.

feature.name: Nicer Vallis
feature.origin: Classical name for present Neckar River, Germany.

feature.name: Nilokeras
feature.origin: "Horn of the Nile;" part of "Nulus" Canal.

feature.name: Nilosyrtis
feature.origin: Syrtis of the Nile; part of Nilus (Nile) Canal.

feature.name: Niquero
feature.origin: Town in the Republic of Cuba.

feature.name: Nix Olympica
feature.origin: "Snows of Olympus;" Olympus was mountain home of gods in Greece.

feature.name: Noctis Tholus
feature.origin: Classical albedo feature name, Noctis Lacus.

feature.name: Nordenskild
feature.origin: Nils Adolf Erik; Swedish geologist and geographer, arctic researcher (1832-1901).

feature.name: Obock
feature.origin: Town in the Republic of Djibouti.

feature.name: Ochus Valles
feature.origin: Classical name for present Hari-Rud River in Turkmenistan.

feature.name: Ogygis Regio
feature.origin: "Region of Ogygos;" Ogygos was ancient King of Thebes or Athens, Greece.

feature.name: Ogygis Undae
feature.origin: Classical albedo feature name: Ogygis Regio.

feature.name: Oltis Valles
feature.origin: Ancient name for modern Lot river, France.

feature.name: [Olympia Planitia]
feature.origin: Classical albedo feature name. Name dropped because the region is high relative to the surrounding area, and planitia is therefore not a correct descriptor term.

feature.name: Ophir
feature.origin: Biblical land to which King Solomon sent naval expedition; probably India.

feature.name: Orson Welles
feature.origin: George Orson; American radio and motion picture actor and director (1915-1985).

feature.name: Ortygia
feature.origin: Floating island (present Delos) where Leto bore Apollo and Artemis.

feature.name: Ortygia Colles
feature.origin: Named for classical albedo feature at 65N, 350W.

feature.name: [Ortygia Tholus]
feature.origin: Classical albedo feature name; dropped in 1979.

feature.name: Oxia Palus
feature.origin: Lake (swamp into which Oxus River flows; i.e. Sea of Aral).

feature.name: Padus Vallis
feature.origin: Classical name for modern Po River in Italy.

feature.name: Palikir
feature.origin: Capital of the Federated States of Micronesia.

feature.name: Pallacopas Vallis
feature.origin: Lowell canal name; also classical river name.

feature.name: Panchaia
feature.origin: Situated near Heliopolis, Egypt; or island in Red Sea rich in frankincense, gold, silver, thus Utopia.

feature.name: Panchaia Rups
feature.origin: Named for classical albedo feature at 62N, 220W.

feature.name: Pandorae Fretum
feature.origin: Woman who let loose evils of world when she opened a box.

feature.name: Paran Valles
feature.origin: Ancient and modern name for South American river (Brazil, Argentina).

feature.name: Paros
feature.origin: Famous in antiquity for its marble quarries.

feature.name: Peace Vallis
feature.origin: River in British Columbia and Alberta, Canada.

feature.name: [Peneus Mons]
feature.origin: Albedo feature name. Same feature as Peraea Mons.

feature.name: Perrotin
feature.origin: Henri A.; French astronomer, studied dark lineations on Mars (1845-1904).

feature.name: Phaethontis
feature.origin: "Of Phaethon;" who recklessly drove Chariot of Sun.

feature.name: Phillips
feature.origin: John; British geologist (1800-1874). Theodore E.; British astronomer (1868-1942).

feature.name: Phlegra
feature.origin: "Burning plain;" in Chalcidian Peninsula of Greece where Zeus hurled thunderbolts at Titans to support Hercules.

feature.name: Phlegra Dorsa
feature.origin: Named for classical albedo feature at 35N, 195W.

feature.name: Phoenicis Lacus
feature.origin: "Lake of the Phoenix;" Arabia or India.

feature.name: Phrixi Regio
feature.origin: "Phrixus' Region;" Phrixus and sister Helle escaped sacrifice in Boeotia on back of ram with golden fleece.

feature.name: Pickering
feature.origin: Edward Charles; American astronomer (1846-1919), William Henry; American astronomer (1858-1938), Sir William Hayward; New Zealand-American engineer (1910-2004).

feature.name: [Pityusa Dorsa]
feature.origin: From albedo feature; name changed to Pityusa Rupes.

feature.name: Propontis
feature.origin: The Sea of Marmora, Asia Minor.

feature.name: Protei Regio
feature.origin: "Proteus' Region;" Proteus was a sea god with a gift of prophecy.

feature.name: Protonilus
feature.origin: Designation of first (Eastern) part of "Nilus" or Nile Canal.

feature.name: Pyrrhae Regio
feature.origin: "Pyrrha's Region;" named for Pyrrha, wife of Deucalion.

feature.name: Rahe
feature.origin: Jurgen; American astronomer and NASA program director (1940-1997).

feature.name: Ravius Valles
feature.origin: Classical name for river in N.W. Ireland.

feature.name: Rayleigh
feature.origin: Strutt, John W., third Baron Rayleigh; British physicist (1842-1919).

feature.name: Rongxar
feature.origin: Small village in Tibet, near Mt. Everest.

feature.name: Sabis Vallis
feature.origin: Classical name for present Sambre River in France and Belgium.

feature.name: Sabrina Vallis
feature.origin: Classical name for present Severn River, England.

feature.name: Samara Valles
feature.origin: Ancient name for modern Somme River, France.

feature.name: Sarh
feature.origin: Town in the Republic of Chad.

feature.name: Scamander Vallis
feature.origin: Ancient name of river at Troy (modern Turkey).

feature.name: Scandia Cavi
feature.origin: Named for classical albedo feature at 65N, 150W.

feature.name: Scandia Tholi
feature.origin: Named for classical albedo feature at 65N, 150W.

feature.name: Schmidt
feature.origin: Johann F.; German astronomer (1825-1884); Otto Y.; Russian geophysicist (1891-1956).

feature.name: Sibiti
feature.origin: Town in the Republic of Congo (Congo-Brazzaville).

feature.name: Simois Colles
feature.origin: Classical albedo feature name of Greek origin.

feature.name: Sinai
feature.origin: Biblical; named for area next to Mare Erythraeum (Indian Ocean).

feature.name: Sinus Sabaeus
feature.origin: Today's Red Sea; Saba was part of southern Arabian Peninsula.

feature.name: Sithonius Lacus
feature.origin: Region inhabited by Sithonii; synonym of Thrace.

feature.name: Sklodowska
feature.origin: Marie; Polish-born French chemist (Mme P. Curie) (1867-1934).

feature.name: Slipher
feature.origin: Vesto M.; American astronomer (1875-1969); Earl C.; American astronomer (1883-1964).

feature.name: Solis Lacus
feature.origin: "Lake of the Sun"; the so-called "Eye of Mars," connecting East with West.

feature.name: Stura Vallis
feature.origin: Classical river east of Rome, Italy.

feature.name: Styx
feature.origin: Great river around nether region, which souls must cross on journey from Earth.

feature.name: Sungari Vallis
feature.origin: River in China, also known as Songhua Jiang.

feature.name: Surinda Valles
feature.origin: Name proposed by Soviets; found on Mars-5 Map.

feature.name: Syria
feature.origin: Province in Near East including Phoenicia; or one of the Cyclades (Homer).

feature.name: Syrtis Major
feature.origin: Libyan Gulf, now Gulf of Sirte.

feature.name: [Syrtis Major Planitia]
feature.origin: Classical albedo feature name; changed from Planitia to Planum 1982.

feature.name: Syrtis Major Planum
feature.origin: Albedo feature name; changed from Planitia to Planum.

feature.name: Tader Valles
feature.origin: Ancient name for present Segura River, Spain.

feature.name: Taejin
feature.origin: Town in the Republic of Korea.

feature.name: Tagus Valles
feature.origin: Ancient and modern river in Spain, Portugal.

feature.name: Tempe
feature.origin: Greek valley south of Mt. Olympus noted for its beauty.

feature.name: Termes Vallis
feature.origin: Classical river in ancient Lusitania, present Tormes River, Spain.

feature.name: [Terra Meridiani]
feature.origin: Classical albedo feature name. Name dropped when new boundaries for regional features were defined in July, 2001.

feature.name: Tharsis
feature.origin: Connecting link between East and West; ancient Spanish town Tartessus.

feature.name: Thaumasia
feature.origin: Named for Thaumas, god of clouds; Arabia.

feature.name: Thira
feature.origin: Town on Santorini Island in the Aegean Sea.

feature.name: [Thyles Chasma]
feature.origin: Classical albedo feature; name changed to Thyles Rupes.

feature.name: Thyles Rupes
feature.origin: Name and feature changes 1984 from Ultimi Cavi and Thyles Chasma.

feature.name: Thymiamata
feature.origin: "Land of sweet-scented perfumes"; South Yemen or India.

feature.name: Tignish
feature.origin: Town in Prince Edward Island, Canada.

feature.name: Tisia Valles
feature.origin: Ancient name for modern Tisza River, Ukraine.

feature.name: [Tithoniae Catena]
feature.origin: Classical albedo feature name. Name dropped because in the database twice.

feature.name: [Tithoniae Fossae]
feature.origin: Classical albedo feature name. Name dropped because in the database twice.

feature.name: Tithonius Lacus
feature.origin: "Tithonian Lake"; Tithonus received from his wife Eos eternal life but not eternal youth.

feature.name: Tiu Valles
feature.origin: Word for "Mars" in old English (West Germanic).

feature.name: [Tno]
feature.origin: Town in Japan. Name dropped because crater cannot be located on imagery.

feature.name: Trebia Valles
feature.origin: Classical name for modern Trebbia River, Italy.

feature.name: Triolet
feature.origin: Town in the Republic of Mauritius.

feature.name: Trivium Charontis
feature.origin: "Crossroad of Charon"; meeting place of several netherworld Canals.

feature.name: Tyras Vallis
feature.origin: Classical name for present Dniester River, Ukraine.

feature.name: Una Vallis
feature.origin: River in Bosnia and Herzegovina and Croatia.

feature.name: Utopia Rups
feature.origin: Named for calssical albedo feature at 55N, 260W.

feature.name: Vaduz
feature.origin: Capital of the Principality of Liechtenstein.

feature.name: Valles Marineris
feature.origin: General name of the system of canyons honoring the scientific team of the Mariner 9 program.

feature.name: Varus Valles
feature.origin: Classical name for present Var River, France.

feature.name: Victoria
feature.origin: Town in the Republic of Seychelles.

feature.name: Vistula Valles
feature.origin: Classical name for modern Wistla River in Poland.

feature.name: Voeykov
feature.origin: A. I.; Russian climatologist and geographer (1842-1916).

feature.name: Vulcani Pelagus
feature.origin: Named for Vulcan, Roman god of fire.

feature.name: Weert
feature.origin: Town in the Netherlands. (Spelling corrected from Weer.)

feature.name: [Wum]
feature.origin: Town in Cameroon. Name dropped because crater cannot be located on imagery.

feature.name: Yaonis Regio
feature.origin: Named for Chinese Emperor Yao; flood occurred during his reign.

feature.name: Yellowknife
feature.origin: Town in the Northwest Territories, Canada.

feature.name: Zeus Patera
feature.origin: Greek sky, thunder and lightning god, who ruled as king of the gods of Mount Olympus.
